about_the_game:
The Soul Inside Us is a survival horror game that plunges you into the depths of darkness, filled with tension and fear. This multiplayer action-strategy game is designed for those who thrive in a terrifying atmosphere. Choose to play as the Soul, the Medium, or a Human, and take your place in the battle for survival.

STORY


Once a peaceful entity, The Soul succumbed to darkness after an unknown tragedy. Now, driven by a burning desire for revenge, this spirit possesses the minds of humans, forcing them to commit horrific acts. Its goal is to extinguish humanity to ease its own pain. But why? The Soul seeks to atone for a deep betrayal and a tragic loss it suffered. Blaming humanity for its demise, it feeds on their fears as it pursues its vengeful quest. However, this journey for revenge only drags it further into darkness.

GAMEPLAY


The Soul Inside Us is a game that involves 4 to 10 players and features three distinct roles: Humans, Medium, and Soul.



  • Each completed task earns you 1 metal piece. You need 5 metal pieces to craft a weapon.
  • Bullets can be found directly through rewarded tasks. They can also be produced indirectly by combining gunpowder and metal pieces.
  • The only way to survive is to find and kill the Soul. However, attacking the wrong person may lead to your own death.
  • Dead players’ identities can be learned from the Medium. If the Medium is dead or if you do not trust anyone, you will have to rely on your memory.



  • The Medium starts the game with a weapon and a sufficient amount of bullets.
  • The Medium can see both dead and alive players in real-time.
  • If the Medium kills a Human, all their bullets will be lost.
  • Like Humans, the Medium can find or produce bullets by completing tasks.



  • The vengeful Soul starts the game with only a knife.
  • With each completed task, the Soul gains 1 jumpscare opportunity, which can be placed anywhere.
  • When a player experiences a jumpscare, the Soul enjoys their fear and can track their location on the map for a certain period.
  • The Soul can observe both dead and alive players in real-time.

Each role comes with its own challenges and strategies, making every game different and thrilling.

FEATURES


  • Security Cameras: Security cameras are located in the observation tower at the end of the garden maze. From this point, you can observe other players and track their movements. Develop your strategy and have the opportunity to spot dangers in advance.

  • MiniMap and Map: Use the MiniMap to easily explore your surroundings, and open the large map to view tasks and teleportation points in more detail. This helps you plan your route and complete your objectives more efficiently.

  • Zipline and Teleportation Points: Use ziplines and teleportation points located in different areas of the map to quickly move around and complete tasks faster. However, remember that you need to wait a while before using another teleportation point after using one.

  • Voice Chat: Voice chat in the game is available in two modes: 2D and 3D (proximity-based). You can select your preferred option from the lobby settings. Both chat types can affect gameplay:

    • With 2D voice chat, you can hear everyone from anywhere on the map.
    • With 3D voice chat, the volume adjusts based on physical distance; you can only communicate with players nearby.

    However, be cautious about who you speak with and what you share; talking in some situations can put you at risk, or even lead to death.

The Soul Inside Us perfectly blends elements of horror, strategy, and survival, offering a unique experience with every game. Let the darkness consume you and find out if you have the courage to survive.

name: The Soul Inside Us

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 or new-gen i3 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 or AMD equivalent (AMD FX 9500+ Series)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: In the midst of dark secrets and deadly dangers, do you have the courage to survive and thwart the spirit's plans? Embark on this thrilling adventure with The Soul Inside Us and push your limits!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
